GenAiFunction.description: This action identifies the correct agent for a user’s request and invokes it to perform the necessary task. It helps the user accomplish actions such as processing a research study, finding eligible patients for an enrolled site, performing a PCP eligibility check, or retrieving patient compatibility scores. Phrases that can trigger this action include “Process Research Study 0001,” “Get eligible patients for enrolled site,” “Perform PCP check,” and “Get patient compatibility scores.”
